y":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"brandRegistrationCurrentEarnings","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"metaverse","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_brandId","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"onBrandOwnerChanged","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"_name","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_description","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_image","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_icon16x16","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_icon32x32","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_icon64x64","type":"string"}],"name":"registerBrand","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_newCost","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setBrandRegistrationCost","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"interfaceId","type":"bytes4"}],"name":"supportsInterface","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_brandId","type":"address"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_challengeUrl","type":"string"}],"name":"updateBrandChallengeUrl","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_brandId","type":"address"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_icon","type":"string"}],"name":"updateBrandIcon16x16Url","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_brandId","type":"address"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_icon","type":"string"}],"name":"updateBrandIcon32x32Url","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_brandId","type":"address"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_icon","type":"string"}],"name":"updateBrandIcon64x64Url","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_brandId","type":"address"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_image","type":"string"}],"name":"updateBrandImage","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_brandId","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"_committed","type":"bool"}],"name":"updateBrandSocialCommitment","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawBrandRegistrationEarnings","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{},"version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"BrandEarningsWithdrawn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"This event is triggered when brand earnings were withdrawn successfully."},"BrandRegistered(address,address,string,string,uint256)":{"notice":"This event is triggered when a brand is registered. The new address is also included, along some reference data."},"BrandRegistrationCostUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"An event for when the brand registration cost is updated."},"BrandSocialCommitmentUpdated(address,address,bool)":{"notice":"This event is triggered when a brand is updated with respect to its social commitment (this is: to tell a brand is socially committed according to the metaverse's views or not). Special benefits (in particular, with respect to assets loading on customers) are given in clients to socially committed brands."},"BrandUpdated(address,address)":{"notice":"This event is triggered when a brand is registered. The new address is also included, along some reference data."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"brandExists(address)":{"notice":"Tells whether an address corresponds to a registered brand or not."},"brandMetadataURI(address)":{"notice":"Assembles the whole metadata for a brand. WARNING: This method will consume a lot of gas if invoked inside a transaction, so it is recommended to invoke this method in the context of a CALL, and never in the context of a SEND (even as part of other contract's code)."},"brandRegistrationCost()":{"notice":"The cost to register a new brand. This can be changed in the future and must be able to be known in the ABI for the users to be aware of the statistic."},"brandRegistrationCurrentEarnings()":{"notice":"Tells the current earnings, not yet withdrawn, from brand registrations."},"constructor":{"notice":"Creating a brand registry requires a valid metaverse registrar as its owner."},"metaverse()":{"notice":"The metaverse that will own this brand registry."},"onBrandOwnerChanged(address,address)":{"notice":"Sets the owner of a brand. This method is meant to be called internally, when the actual brand transfer is done (brands can only be transferred, but never burnt)."},"registerBrand(string,string,string,string,string,string)":{"notice":"Registers a new brand, when the appropriate price is paid for it. For more details on how this method works, check _registerBrand's inline documentation."},"setBrandRegistrationCost(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the new brand registration cost."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"notice":"A brand registry satisfies the IBrandRegistry and IERC165."},"updateBrandChallengeUrl(address,string)":{"notice":"Updates the brand's challenge url. Only the owner of the brand or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the url is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON."},"updateBrandIcon16x16Url(address,string)":{"notice":"Updates the brand's 16x16 icon url. Ensure the _icon is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON."},"updateBrandIcon32x32Url(address,string)":{"notice":"Updates the brand's 32x32 icon url. Ensure the _icon is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON."},"updateBrandIcon64x64Url(address,string)":{"notice":"Updates the brand's 64x64 icon url. Only the owner of the brand or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _icon is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON."},"updateBrandImage(address,string)":{"notice":"Updates the brand image. Only the owner of the brand or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _image is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON."},"updateBrandSocialCommitment(address,bool)":{"notice":"Updates whether a brand is socially committed or not."},"withdrawBrandRegistrationEarnings(uint256)":{"notice":"Allows the sender to withdraw brand registration earnings."}},"notice":"A Brand registry will keep track of the brands being registered. documentation.text:
A Brand registry will keep track of the brands being registered.
 Those brands will hold the metadata, and this trait will hold
 the mean to register such brand with its metadata.
The metaverse that will own this brand registry.

The cost to register a new brand. This can be changed in
 the future and must be able to be known in the ABI for the
 users to be aware of the statistic.

All the registered brands are here. Each brand will have
 a non-empty name and non-empty description. Brands can
 only be added - never deleted / unregistered.
The count of registered brands.

Tells the current earnings, not yet withdrawn, from brand
 registrations.

Tells whether the specified user can set the registration
 cost, or not.
An event for when the brand registration cost is updated.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: the owner contract must not be 0"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: the owner contract must not be 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: the owner contract must not be 0"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: the owner contract must implement IMetaverse"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: the owner contract must implement IMetaverse

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: the owner contract must implement IMetaverse"

documentation.text:
Creating a brand registry requires a valid metaverse
 registrar as its owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: only the owning metaverse can invoke this method"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: only the owning metaverse can invoke this method

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: only the owning metaverse can invoke this method"

documentation.text: This modifier restricts function to be only invoked by the metaverse.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: not allowed to set the brand registration cost"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: not allowed to set the brand registration cost

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: not allowed to set the brand registration cost"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: the brand registry cost must not be less than 0.01 native tokens"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: the brand registry cost must not be less than 0.01 native tokens

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: the brand registry cost must not be less than 0.01 native tokens"

documentation.text: Sets the new brand registration cost.
Tells whether a particular user is the owner of the brand id.

This event is triggered when a brand is registered. The new
 address is also included, along some reference data.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: use a non-empty image url"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: use a non-empty image url

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: use a non-empty image url"

documentation.text:
Given the appropriate metadata, mints a new brand. The image url
 is mandatory, but about:blank may be used if it is missing or one
 image is not yet ready. The icons are optional. An empty string
 or about:blank should be used if not needed. Ensure all the urls
 are empty (as permitted) or valid urls, and the name and description
 have only json-string-friendly character, no backslash, and no double
 quotes or the metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON,
 also taking special care with the name and description, since they
 cannot be changed later.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,string memory,bool)

documentation.text:
Registers a new brand, when the appropriate price is paid for it.
 For more details on how this method works, check _registerBrand's
 inline documentation.

Tells whether the specified user can set the brand social
 commitment to a brand, or not. Brands with that flag set
 are (1) non-commercial and (2) aligned to this metaverse's
 social commitment views.

This event is triggered when a brand is updated with respect
 to its social commitment (this is: to tell a brand is socially
 committed according to the metaverse's views or not). Special
 benefits (in particular, with respect to assets loading on
 customers) are given in clients to socially committed brands.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: not allowed to set brands' social commitment"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: not allowed to set brands' social commitment

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: not allowed to set brands' social commitment"

documentation.text: Updates whether a brand is socially committed or not.

Sets the owner of a brand. This method is meant to be called
 internally, when the actual brand transfer is done (brands
 can only be transferred, but never burnt).

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: caller is not brand owner nor approved"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: caller is not brand owner nor approved

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: caller is not brand owner nor approved"

documentation.text:
This modifiers limits the action so that only owners or
 approved operators can invoke it (it also implies that
 the brand itself must exist).

This event is triggered when a brand is registered. The new
 address is also included, along some reference data.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: use a non-empty image url"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: use a non-empty image url

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: use a non-empty image url"

documentation.text:
Updates the brand image. Only the owner of the brand or an
 approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _image is
 empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled
 into valid JSON.

Updates the brand's challenge url. Only the owner of the brand
 or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the url
 is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled
 into valid JSON.

Updates the brand's 16x16 icon url. Only the owner of the brand
 or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _icon
 is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled
 into valid JSON.

Updates the brand's 32x32 icon url. Only the owner of the brand
 or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _icon
 is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled
 into valid JSON.

Updates the brand's 64x64 icon url. Only the owner of the brand
 or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _icon
 is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled
 into valid JSON.

Assembles the whole metadata for a brand. WARNING: This method
 will consume a lot of gas if invoked inside a transaction, so
 it is recommended to invoke this method in the context of a
 CALL, and never in the context of a SEND (even as part of other
 contract's code).
Tells whether an address corresponds to a registered brand or not.
Tells whether the sender can withdraw the earnings from brand registration.
This event is triggered when brand earnings were withdrawn successfully.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings cannot be withdrawn by this sender"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: earnings cannot be withdrawn by this sender

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings cannot be withdrawn by this sender"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings amount must not be 0"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: earnings amount must not be 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings amount must not be 0"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings amount is less than the requested amount"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: earnings amount is less than the requested amount

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings amount is less than the requested amount"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: earnings amount must not be 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings amount must not be 0"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings amount is less than the requested amount"

arguments.value: BrandRegistry: earnings amount is less than the requested amount

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BrandRegistry: earnings amount is less than the requested amount"

documentation.text: Allows the sender to withdraw brand registration earnings.
A brand registry satisfies the IBrandRegistry and IERC165.

BrandEarningsWithdrawn(address,uint256).notice: This event is triggered when brand earnings were withdrawn successfully.

BrandRegistered(address,address,string,s.notice: This event is triggered when a brand is registered. The new address is also included, along some reference data.

BrandRegistrationCostUpdated(uint256).notice: An event for when the brand registration cost is updated.

BrandSocialCommitmentUpdated(address,add.notice: This event is triggered when a brand is updated with respect to its social commitment (this is: to tell a brand is socially committed according to the metaverse's views or not). Special benefits (in particular, with respect to assets loading on customers) are given in clients to socially committed brands.

BrandUpdated(address,address).notice: This event is triggered when a brand is registered. The new address is also included, along some reference data.

brandExists(address).notice: Tells whether an address corresponds to a registered brand or not.

brandMetadataURI(address).notice: Assembles the whole metadata for a brand. WARNING: This method will consume a lot of gas if invoked inside a transaction, so it is recommended to invoke this method in the context of a CALL, and never in the context of a SEND (even as part of other contract's code).

brandRegistrationCost().notice: The cost to register a new brand. This can be changed in the future and must be able to be known in the ABI for the users to be aware of the statistic.

brandRegistrationCurrentEarnings().notice: Tells the current earnings, not yet withdrawn, from brand registrations.

constructor.notice: Creating a brand registry requires a valid metaverse registrar as its owner.

metaverse().notice: The metaverse that will own this brand registry.

onBrandOwnerChanged(address,address).notice: Sets the owner of a brand. This method is meant to be called internally, when the actual brand transfer is done (brands can only be transferred, but never burnt).

registerBrand(string,string,string,strin.notice: Registers a new brand, when the appropriate price is paid for it. For more details on how this method works, check _registerBrand's inline documentation.

setBrandRegistrationCost(uint256).notice: Sets the new brand registration cost.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: A brand registry satisfies the IBrandRegistry and IERC165.

updateBrandChallengeUrl(address,string).notice: Updates the brand's challenge url. Only the owner of the brand or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the url is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON.

updateBrandIcon16x16Url(address,string).notice: Updates the brand's 16x16 icon url. Only the owner of the brand or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _icon is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON.

updateBrandIcon32x32Url(address,string).notice: Updates the brand's 32x32 icon url. Only the owner of the brand or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _icon is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON.

updateBrandIcon64x64Url(address,string).notice: Updates the brand's 64x64 icon url. Only the owner of the brand or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _icon is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON.

updateBrandImage(address,string).notice: Updates the brand image. Only the owner of the brand or an approved account can invoke this method. Ensure the _image is empty or a valid URL, or metadata might fail to be assembled into valid JSON.

updateBrandSocialCommitment(address,bool.notice: Updates whether a brand is socially committed or not.

withdrawBrandRegistrationEarnings(uint25.notice: Allows the sender to withdraw brand registration earnings.

userdoc.notice: A Brand registry will keep track of the brands being registered. Those brands will hold the metadata, and this trait will hold the mean to register such brand with its metadata.
